settings.title: ABOUT STEPHEN LEASE
settings.text:
CEO AND CO-FOUNDER OF GOODR

Stephen Lease is currently the CEO (Chief Executive Octopus) of the sunglasses brand goodr and the co-host of the CULTURE goodr Podcast. Stephen‚Äôs spirit animal is an octopus, he‚Äôs soul-bonded with a basset hound, and he is 16% flamingo.

Since Stephen co-founded goodr in 2015 (his sixth company), goodr has grown to over 100 employees, is sold in over 5,000 doors worldwide, and has won numerous awards, including ‚ÄúGear of the Year‚Äù by Runner‚Äôs World Magazine, and ‚ÄúBest Places to Work‚Äù by Inc. Magazine.

Stephen has been featured in publications such as Yahoo Finance, Inc Magazine, and The Pop Insider for his creative and progressive approach to company culture and branding.

Find out more at stephenlease.com.

settings.title: A'S FOR YOUR BURNING Q'S
settings.tab_title_1: AREAS OF PASSION, EXPERTISE, AND GOODR EXPERIENCE
settings.tab_text_1:
• How to actually live and breathe your company's values.
  • Why you shouldn't care if people don't like you.
  • Chill is the New Busy: How to prioritize your team's mental health.
  • Balancing fun and getting the job done.
  • Ways to "gut check" your "good culture."
  • Transparency: Ensuring it's showcased in everything.
  • From employee hiring to evaluations.
  • Where to draw the line: "Challenge the Status Quo" vs. "Going corporate to grow the business."
settings.tab_text_2:
One day ‚Äúavid runner‚Äù Stephen Lease looked in the mirror and had an awakening: He looked like the biggest tool in the world. Lame hat, dorky shades, compression everything, giant arm sleeves, run belt with gels, and a performance diaper. (Okay, the performance diaper is a joke, but everything else is true).
"What the f*** am I wearing right now?" he wondered. After hitting rock bottom, Stephen noticed most runners weren't wearing overpriced high-performance sunglasses. They wore cheap sunnies from gas stations. There was a huge opportunity for stylish, fun, functional, affordable shades in the running space. This was the seed of goodr! (A pink, flamingo-shaped seed, watered with pi√±a coladas.)

The CULTURE goodr Podcast: Behind the shades at goodr with fun & authenticity

Although it may seem like we slam margaritas all day‚Ä¶ we don‚Äôt. We work really hard on our culture. Each week we‚Äôll bring you a topic or guest that will show you how we got here, and how we fucked up so you won‚Äôt have to.
